details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.3 Document Information Dictionary - Producer and pdf:Producer
details.description: The value of Producer entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property pdf:Producer shall be equivalent.

rule.description: The value of Producer entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property pdf:Producer shall be equivalent.

error.message: The value of Producer entry from the document Info dictionary and its matching XMP property pdf:Producer are not equivalent (Info /Producer = %1, XMP pdf:Producer = %2)
